slide1.title: Build your e-commerce shop
slide1.description: Build your e-commerce store using innovative and reliable technologies stack.
slide2.title: Administer your store
slide2.description: Use Jeeshop Admin, a light and responsive BackOffice application to manage your store.
slide3.title: Contribute to Jeeshop 1.0 release
slide3.description: Jeeshop is an open-source Apache V2 licensed project. You can contribute to it and help us to release its first version!
